14 #include "llvm/Bitcode/BitcodeWriterPass.h"
15 #include "llvm/Bitcode/ReaderWriter.h"
16 #include "llvm/IR/Module.h"
17 #include "llvm/IR/PassManager.h"
18 #include "llvm/Pass.h"
19 using namespace llvm;
20 
21 PreservedAnalyses BitcodeWriterPass::run(Module &M) {
22  WriteBitcodeToFile(&M, OS);
23  return PreservedAnalyses::all();
24 }
25 
26 namespace {
27  class WriteBitcodePass : public ModulePass {
28  raw_ostream &OS; // raw_ostream to print on
29  public:
30  static char ID; // Pass identification, replacement for typeid
31  explicit WriteBitcodePass(raw_ostream &o)
32  : ModulePass(ID), OS(o) {}
33 
34  const char *getPassName() const override { return "Bitcode Writer"; }
35 
36  bool runOnModule(Module &M) override {
37  WriteBitcodeToFile(&M, OS);
38  return false;
39  }
40  };
41 }
42 
43 char WriteBitcodePass::ID = 0;
44 
45 ModulePass *llvm::createBitcodeWriterPass(raw_ostream &Str) {
46  return new WriteBitcodePass(Str);
47 }
